workshoptitle: Get Started with Oracle Cloud Infrastructure Data Integration

tutorials.title: Introduction: OCI Data Integration
tutorials.description: Learn about the features provided by the data integration services

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Create a Data Loader task
tutorials.description: Learn how to create a Data Loader task in OCI Data Integration.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Create an Application, a Pipeline and publish tasks
tutorials.description: Learn how to create an OCI Data Integration application, publish tasks into the application and create a Data Integration pipeline which calls the published tasks.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Run Data Loader task, schedule and run Pipeline task
tutorials.description: Learn how to run a Data Loader task, create a task schedule in your OCI Data Integration application, to schedule the Pipeline task and to run it.
